amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for International Disaster and Famine Assistance for Sudan by $50 million; increase funding for the Department of State Global HIV/AIDS Initiative by $50 million; and reduce funding for Egypt by $100 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for International Disaster and Famine Assistance for Sundan by $50 million and for the Department of State Global HIV/AIDS Initiative by $50 million by offseting funding for Egypt by $100 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 236).
